participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Creative, adventurous, and a bit quirky. Loves to experiment with new hobbies and enjoys connecting with others.
participant_1.background: I juggle for a living in a circus, and I come from a small town in the Midwest. Since my dog died I am incomplete. My father is a wildlife veterinarian and my mother is an animal rights activist. I was too scared to come out to my parents on my last birthday, so I just spent the day with my friends. Others think I'm weird because I'm a health nut but still love sweets.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and introspective, loves to delve into new interests and enjoys sharing her passions with others.
participant_2.background: I bought a book that would help me learn more about myself. My favorite show is Tom and Jerry. After a long day at work, my favorite way to unwind is to watch anime and superhero shows. I love to spend my time listening to Katy Perry while I track my bets. I enjoy going outside to collect mushrooms, and my family is very supportive of this interest.

content.text: Hi there!  I'm from the midwest and I'm a juggler in a circus!
Hi! I'm from the east coast and I really enjoy anime!
Oh cool! I just bought a book that would help me learn more about myself. What are you currently reading?
I actually just finished reading a book about mushrooms! I love going outside and collecting them.
That's so cool! I've never been interested in mushrooms but I'm always down to try new things! What's your favorite type of mushroom?
I think my favorite type of mushroom is the morel. They're so delicious!
I've never had a morel before! I'll have to try one sometime.
You definitely should! They're so good!
I really like My Hero Academia! It's so funny and inspiring.
I've heard good things about that one! I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's one of my favorites.
Awesome! I'm always looking for new things to watch!
